name: Children of Joriah
description:
Your name is Miles Cooper, a 25-year-old man who mysteriously lost contact with his sister, Jane. You've been trying to track her whereabouts for the past few months and believe that she has joined a cult known as, The Children of Joriah.  You get too close to finding Jane and end up a victim inside Joriah's compound. Escape the compound and save Jane

Please play the game in full-screen as some of the text may be cut off otherwise.
